alert.note: Alert for Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 1:39PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Kern County through 215 PM PDT... At 139 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles south of Inyokern, or 16 miles southwest of Ridgecrest, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Kern County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes
